0150.name: Custom Pretendo Error
0150.message:
The online service is unavailable.
Please try again later.

For help, visit support.nintendo.com.
0150.long_description: Serial number mismatch: your console files used for online play have been tampered.
0150.short_solution: Revert your original serial or LocalFriendCodeSeed_B or report the issue
0150.long_solution: Usually a result after bypassing a Nintendo Network ban by changing the LocalFriendCodeSeed_B. Revert the original LocalFriendCodeSeed_B or NAND backup. If you don't have a backup, join the Discord server for help.
